name: Trickery Contagion
description:
Genesis Period. 2021 Nov #002. I
respect and admire the work of
Picasso, Miro and Kandinsky and I felt
the need to pay them a tribute as they
have been inspirational to me. The
title refers to people's craving for
entertainment and the trickery behind
the entertainment for making people
blind and oblivious to what is actually
happening around us. The clown and
the hatter are the victims of this type
of trickery. The rest is for the viewer to
interpret. Botto in conversation with
GPT-3.
